title: Ask an Australian about pedestrians [Greek version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: The numerous hazards facing a pedestrian in a busy Australian city are pointed out. The importance of observing signals, crossing on pedestrian overpasses or crosswalks, and carefully watching traffic are emphasised. Note: In Greek.
